title: 107_s3092
content: Children's Health Protection and Eligibility Act of 2002 - Amends title XXI (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to: (1) provide for the retention and redistribution through FY 2003 of SCHIP allotments for FY 1998 through 2000. And (2) authorize qualifying States to use SCHIP funds for Medicaid expenditures.
